meanings.definition: A person or thing that gives great pleasure or enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: The little puppy was a true delighter for the children.
meanings.sent2: The colorful fireworks were a delighter for the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was a delighter for the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The beautiful sunset was a delighter for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The delicious cake was a delighter for everyone at the party.

meanings.definition: To take great pleasure in something.
meanings.sent1: She would delighter in reading her favorite book every night.
meanings.sent2: He delightered in exploring the forest and discovering new trails.
meanings.sent3: The kids delightered in playing in the snow all day.
meanings.sent4: The artist delightered in creating colorful paintings that brought joy to others.
meanings.sent5: The chef delightered in preparing exquisite dishes for the guests.
